apply_for_leave.name: apply_for_leave
apply_for_leave.description: Apply for leave with specified start date and half, end date and half, leave type. If only one Date is provider pass it as startDate and endDate

startDate.description: The start date of the leave in YYYY-MM-DD format

startHalf.description: From which half leave start from, strict input are 'First Half' or 'Second Half'.

endDate.description: The end date of the leave in YYYY-MM-DD format

endHalf.description: From which half leave end at, strict input are 'First Half' or 'Second Half'.

leaveType.description: Type of leave being applied. strict input are PL(Privilege Leave), LWP(Leave Without Pay), MARRL(Marriage Leave), BL(Bereavement Leave), PTL(Paternity Leave)

confirmation.description: After receiving startDate, startHalf, endDate, endHalf, reason and leaveType for leave show the leave detail to user and ask for confirmation.

see_leave_balance.name: see_leave_balance
see_leave_balance.description: Check the leave balance available to the user

apply_for_wfh.name: apply_for_wfh
apply_for_wfh.description: Apply for Work From Home (WFH) for specified start and end dates. If only one Date is provider pass it as startDate and endDate

startDate.description: The start date of WFH in YYYY-MM-DD format

endDate.description: The end date of WFH in YYYY-MM-DD format

confirmation.description: After receiving startDate and endDate for WFH show the WFH detail to user and ask for confirmation

request_it_support.name: request_it_support
request_it_support.description: Request IT support by specifying the issue that needs assistance

issue.description: Description of the IT issue that requires support

book_meeting_room.name: book_meeting_room
book_meeting_room.description: Book a meeting room for a specified time slot

roomNumber.description: The meeting room number to be booked

fromTime.description: The start time for the booking in HH:MM format (24-hour clock)

toTime.description: The end time for the booking in HH:MM format (24-hour clock)

see_attendance_log.name: see_attendance_log
see_attendance_log.description: View the attendance log for a specified date range which includes data like working hours, gross hours, break hours absent, is holiday and holiday type. If only one Date is provider pass it as startDate and endDate

startDate.description: The start date for the attendance log in YYYY-MM-DD format

endDate.description: The end date for the attendance log in YYYY-MM-DD format

count.description: The number of latest notifications to fetch. If not provided, pass 10 as default.

see_lunch_menu.name: see_lunch_menu
see_lunch_menu.description: View the lunch menu for a week starting from Monday to Friday

meal_planning.name: meal_planning
meal_planning.description: Plan meals by specifying dates and their application statuses (apply or remove application)

dates.description: An array of objects containing a date and status. The date should be in YYYY-MM-DD format, and the status should be 1 (apply) or 0 (remove application).

date.description: The date for meal planning in YYYY-MM-DD format

status.description: The application status: 1 for applying, 0 for removing application
